website_summaries.verdict: This cute backpack offers ample space and a nice selection of designs, but it comes with some durability issues. Not the best choice for kids who tend to be rambunctious with their belongings.
pros: Features a chest strap for added stability and a front pocket for extra storage space
Main compartment is roomy enough to fit papers, a change of clothes, and snacks
Comes in several adorable design with bold colors kids love
cons: Issues with the zippers jamming/breaking are common
Shoulder straps could be more durable, as they have been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! It's perfect size and so well made.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! It's perfect size and so well made.While the design of this backpack is certainly eye-catching.Got this backpack for my daughter who is 3 years old. It seems to be of decent quality and size. There are two zipper compartments, one much larger main compartment fits her homework folder and lunch also some extra clothes and the other smaller on the front fits some toys.I like the water pockets on both sides for drinks. The zippers seem to be good quality meta and smooth.My daughter loved the print. I loved the size and that the fabric is fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a preschooler to kindergartener!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so cute! We chose the Cute Fruits design. The colors and design are perfect for a little pre-k to kindergartener. I did a lot of searching for a backpack that was large enough to hold paper/folders but not so big that it would overwhelm the frame of my petite 4-year-old. I ordered this one and crossed my fingers it would meet my needs. I'm relieved and pleased to say that it not only met my needs, but my little one approves of it as well! She has been wearing it around the house and cannot wait to start using it for school. The backpack is well made and lightweight. It arrived packaged nicely and on time.
customer_reviews.author: viv ian

customer_reviews.title: Great first backpack !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 yr old son who is pretty tall for his age ( wears 5T) he loves it and it holds a decent amount . We have to help him buckle and unbuckle the front but overall he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: CupCakeArmy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so cute! Great fit for preschooler. My 4.5 year old is obsessed with dinosaurs and this has a nice unisex look with a variety of dinosaurs on it. Will hold standard 8x10 school folder and other essentials. Be aware this is smaller than the general school bag. Built in side bottle holders are great. Looks well constructed and has a 1 year limited warranty. Cons: It is pricey for a small bag and does have a smell. Even after a couple of weeks of letting it air-out, there is a smell. I'm pretty sure that tag said to hand wash, I will verify and see if that elevates the smell.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought the backpack for my 3-year-old before our 3 summer trips. We gave it to her early so she could "get used to using it." Silly me, I thought we'd have to bribe her to use it. Not the case! She LOVES wearing her backpack and loves to pack it with what SHE wants. It's the perfect size for her, she's a tall 3-yr-old, and there is still room to extend the straps. The buckle across the front is great because she doesn't have to worry about the straps falling off her shoulders. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DONT BUY DESPITE HOW CUTE IT IS
customer_reviews.text: I will give it one star for the adorable design but I purchased this bag just over a year ago (meaning the warranty has expired) and the top straps and side straps have ripped off THREE TIMES already. Mind you this is being used by my preschooler so at most contains a library book and bag of goldfish. So bummed because this was such a cute bag and I hate writing negative reviews but please don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: EmilySue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size backpack for toddlers & preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dino-loving 3-year-old (now 4) last year. He is a very tall kid, but he's still too small for a standard big kids backpack that I see so many preschoolers try to wear. The backpacks for elementary school-aged kids are just too wide and long for preschoolers (and toddlers). This backpack fits an extra change of clothes, wipes, plus a pair of shoes. The side pockets fit his water bottle just fine. And the chest clip helps keep the backpack steady while he runs around with it on. The dinosaur design is adorable and you probably will be the only one with this special backpack. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Where Rivers Flow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect elementary bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest backpack! Was purchased for my 5 yr old going to Kindergarten. Perfect size! She’s small for her age and this doesn’t hang to the back of her legs causing her kick it like her preschool bag did. Fits a take home folder plus extras. The padding on the shoulders is great and I appreciate the chest clip to help balance it for her. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: M. TroutTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for price!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved this backpack as soon as he saw it. It's a little big for him at the moment, but it seems pretty durable so he'll probably have it for a few years at least. My two issues with it is the zipper can get easily stuck on the fabric, but luckily it doesn't tear or shred the fabric. And lastly, the shoulder straps move around so easily that they don't stay where you want them, causing the bag to droop down his back, so I've had to tie them. Other than, is a great bag for the price! Fits a lot of stuff. We once put shoes, a lunch box, and a jacket in there. Not bad!
customer_reviews.author: T.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We've had two of these bags now. The first one was an unfortunate issue on our end that caused us to have to purchase a second. The second backpack started ripping on the shoulder strap 2 1/2 months into having it. I contacted the seller and they were incredibly prompt in their service. Once showing them the defect, they immediately said they would replace the bag with no issues. Overall, we LOVE this bag and use it as our toddlers backpack. It's much easier to carry around one of these v a traditional diaper bag, plus all the designs are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Terrible zippers break fast DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely frustrating. One zipper puly broke right away, the other keeps getting caught on the material flap. My 5 year old son cannot independently use these zippers and his teachers complained how they are so challenging. Now both are broken. It did not even survive through one school year!!! Terrible waste of money and so frustrating as the reviews were so positive....
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Kindergartener. Perfect size! Fits her take home folder and lunch box perfectly and the print is so cute! I was worried about finding something not too small and not too big because she is barely 40 lbs but this is perfect! My only issue is the flap covering the zipper gets stuck in the zipper sometimes but it is easy to unjam zipper. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after second day
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute; however, the zipper broke after the second day of use. It looks like it was not sewn properly and both zippers just rolled off the end. My daughter is in kindergarten and, of course, she lost one of the zippers. My husband was able to get the one zipper back on the track, but now I have to try to sew the end of the zipper down so it doesn't happen again. I will probably not buy this brand again. UPDATE: They did send me other backpack and it's cute. The zipper was not broken on this one. We shall see how well it holds up! (I updated to 3 stars instead of 1)
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected, lasts years.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter got her blue spaceship Vaschy backpack two years ago, and it is still going strong. The only issue is that the chest strap doesn't click closed any longer, but honestly I still think two years is amazing longevity for a child's backpack. So as my littlest one heads off to preschool I've just ordered this purple unicorn version for her. It seems to be of the same quality and I am expecting to get years of use from this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katastic

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I just received these, and for the price the quality is better than I thought. I ordered the large unicorns for my 5 year old to use in the fall for kindergarten and it should fit her for a couple years. I ordered the small dinosaurs for my 2.5 year old and it fits him perfectly. Once difference I noticed is the small bag has elastic pockets on the sides where the large doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It's fun without having paw patrol or Pj masks all over it. I know a couple reviews say you can't fit a folder but my son's folder fits in this okay. It's a tiny bit pushed down on the corners but barely. I like the drink holders on the side and the front pocket is a good size for my son's snack. I think it'll be too small for kindergarten but when he gets there we can make this one his travel backpack and get him a bigger one. It's not like they're meant to use the same backpack forever anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Heather + Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! My 4 year old is starting preschool and needed a backpack that was able to fit a folder. I had previously bought him a giraffe one that is great for traveling but not for school to put a folder in there and not great if you have an iPad with the plastic bulky case/stand. Based on that purchase I noted that there was a button for “large”. It’s not too big for him and it won’t get too heavy for him either. Lastly the print on it fits his age.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Arie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty backpack and it seems so nicely made!!! It fits my daughter’s supplies and lunch box. She is in kindergarten so I needed a smaller bag. I originally had a full size back pack, but after seeing how she struggles with it, I got this and am glad I did. Although I can’t comment about the durability yet, I would recommend. Oh! It even came with a chest strap attached but I didn’t need it so I just popped it off.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Quality cute pack perfect for kiddos in school
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptic after reading some of the reviews on the backpack. I purchased this for my daughter in preschool. The bag easily fits her 3 ring binder and other items for class. The quality of the bag is very durable and I can see the bag lasting for a long time. My daughter loves the design and it is very comfortable for her to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard 2-pocket folder for school! Buy this, you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 year old girl loves her new backpack! It fits her 2-pocket folder very comfortablely and has room for her snack and pencil case! It is very spacious yet looks compact and comfortable enough to be worn on her small back. My son is 4 and loves his spaceship themed backpack that we purchased from Vaschy as well! The front buckle is so appreciated by both kids anddd myself-mom!! At the end of their school day they don’t look like they’re dragging a backpack down on their arms but they look neat with their backpack strapps straight on their shoulders! Thank you for the thoughtful note inside as well, Vaschy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about this backpack because it is very lightweight. However, my daughter fell in love at first sight. She has really put this thing through its paces and it has held up amazingly well! It's been washed several times. It comes out of the washing machine looking great and dries quickly hanging up. She routinely gets things stuck in the zipper (1st grader) and even with all the "unneccessary violence" they are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2 year old as he’s beginning a preschool program a couple of days a week. The school requested a 11x14 to be able to send home art projects, etc. It’s definitely a bit on the larger side for him but I know he’ll grow into it. It’s sturdy and appears to be well made. I chose the dinosaur one since it has bright green on it and would allow me to spot him quickly in a crowd if need be. It also looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It’s been perfect for my kindergartener who is on the smaller side. It clips in the front so if she has a heavy load it helps hold in on. Fits her folder plus other stuff perfectly. The picture taken was after a full year of use, I’ve washed it multiple times and it comes out looking brand new. She’s now using this for first grade and I’m confident it will make it through the year. It also fits her water bottle in the side pocket and she loves it! I loved it so much I bought the dinosaur version for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi V.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable small backpack that can carry a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been perfect for my preschooler! It is small enough that it is easy to carry and not too overwhelming in size for him. It also fits full size folders and everything that he needs for school. It is a smaller backpack, but we easily fit full size school supplies, extra clothes, zip up jacket, lunchbox, tissues, water bottle, and toys for when we are out places with no problem. It’s the perfect smaller backpack that still fits full size objects. And the dinosaur print is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful backpack for our 4yo. It’s the right size for him to realistically carry. The compartments are plentiful and thoughtfully designed for practical use. He’s loving the Dino print and we love the practicality to fit in his lunch box, a couple books, water bottle and his odds and ends. The buckled strap at the front is key to allow our toddler to carry this comfortably without it falling off.
customer_reviews.author: mommyinthecity

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her backpack!`
customer_reviews.text: This is used by my 5 year old, and it's the perfect size for her. It fits her lunchbox and her water bottle, but she is in pre-k so doesn't have anything else to carry. It feels really sturdy and is showing no signs of wear and tear as yet, but we've only been using it for a couple months. However, if this keeps up, I'm hoping to get another year out of it. And she absolutely LOVES the pattern!!! It's like this was made just for her.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Chu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this backpack because it’s the perfect size for my kindergartener, however I would not recommend this backpack because of the zipper. There is a clan of fabric that hangs over the zipper that keeps getting caught and stuck. Once stuck it is extremely difficult to fix. I have had complaints from the teacher and my son gets really frustrated. He would come home with his backpack half way open from the zipper getting caught on the fabric. Other than that it’s a cute backpack, durable but that issue needs to be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not that durable and costs more than it's worth. I only bought this because my daughter is obsessed with unicorns and the unicorn backpacks sold in stores are only slightly worse quality than this. It's good enough for a year or less of school but I'll definitely have to buy another for next year. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars and not 3 is because it has a bunch of pockets and my daughter loves unicorns so much and it makes her happy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack and great service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack! It was super durable and she luggednit around everywhere. She’s so rough on her things it was a real test. After about 18 months she finally wrecked a zipper. I had paid for the extra warranty but Vaschy relaxes the backpack even though it was out of their warranty period. Vaschy replaced the backpack quickly and their customer service was outstanding. They let me know the status of return every step of the way and followed up to be sure I was happy. Great service!!
customer_reviews.author: Deena Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small size backpack with all of the features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preschooler because her preschool backpack no longer fit anything of substance. This one is just big enough, has decent sized water bottle holders, front pouch, and inside fabric separation if that makes sense. Now we can finally fit lunch, water bottle, school papers, jacket and a small stuffed animal if needed. The chest strap is cute, she loves the unicorns, and most importantly, it looks to be the same style as her big sister's.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sands

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, full size backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Our daughter can't wait to take this to school next year. Fabric is thick and sturdy. I like the front pocket and water bottle pockets. This was a good buy for a full standard size backpack. We had gotten a unicorn backpack from Target but it turned out to be mini and we returned it. Very happy with this and expect it to last multiple years.
customer_reviews.author: ndcokstn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but not meant for school aged kids that carry folders
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is adorable, the quality is fantastic as well. Just make note though, that it is small, not really suitable for school age children that have to carry a folder with their homework in it. Unfortunately I didn't read the whole description (it does state the dimensions), and so for us we just use it for traveling to take toys, or a sleep over where you just need to put in some clothes, toothbrush etc....
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of D&D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute and everyone complimented on my son's new backpack! Great color and well made quality. It's good size for 4 years old. Can hold a lot of stuff. Super cute design. Its got side pockets for drinks too which is a must have for this coming hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I love the backpack. It is just what I was looking for. Light weight, perfect size for my 1 year old. I use it to put his extra clothes, diapers, etc for daycare or when we go out. Essentially using as a diaper bag for now. Pattern and colors are great. The inside did have a strange smell for a couple days but it aired out and is fine now. I do worry about the durability of the straps after long term use and would be carful with how much heavy stuff you put inside.
customer_reviews.author: SLK24

customer_reviews.title: Cute design perfected with chest strap
customer_reviews.text: The chest strap is CRUCIAL for me. My son needed a larger backpack for school, but it’s hard to encourage a three year-old with special needs to keep his back pack on. This chest strap allows me to secure his backpack and it’s contents. He’s pretty hard on his belongings and so far so good with this! We’ve only had it 2 months (using it twice weekly) but I think it’ll last all school year and that’s a reasonable ask for the price I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my 2 year old. This is our 3rd backpack in a year and a half. After reading reviews about how durable it was, I figured I’d give it a shot. This is the BEST backpack we have gotten. It’s a perfect size for him to carry it around but also big enough for us parents to put on. It has enough room for his daycare essentials. I also get compliments on the print anytime we go somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Size is great for small children. Looks good but quality is not that good. The zipper is not smooth which makes it especially difficult for younger kids. The slip for water bottle is too small. My daughter really likes the unicorn design and the fact that the straps have a chest strap. Otherwise, I’d return it.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pack for a Mini-Traveler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my pre-school aged daughter. She was able to carry a notebook, two pairs of headphones, 2-3 bags of candy, and her precious doll. There was more than enough room for all over her travel "essentials" (and for some of her sibling's essentials!). I would recommend this for the little kid on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Buys (and Tries) Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic backpack for a small child and my preschooler loves it! We ordered the small - it is small enough to fit comfortably on a four year old’s back, but large enough to fit a full size folder (and plenty more). We picked this backpack specifically because of the chest strap, which is a really nice feature that helps it not slip off the child’s shoulders, which would otherwise especially happen when worn over the slippery material of a winter coat. Everything about this backpack is really sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my toddler for Preschool. Super cute but had bog holes around the zipper within a couple months and the inside bottom was peeling apart We kept a change of clothes mittens, hat and a folder in it so was not overloaded.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest backpack for my four year old. He wanted a character one (which I’m against). So this was a great compromise with the dinosaurs. It’s adorable. The smaller one fits him best. Since he’s still only in preschool it was perfect. I feel like it will work through kindergarten. The bigger one was way too big for his little body. The fabric is a little thiner than I was expecting but for the price it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke in three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought the backpack, was very happy with the straps, size, front pocket is great. Big enough to hold daughters marble notebook, chromebook, big math notebook, lunch box, etc. Issue became the zipper, it always gets caught on the fabric. After three weeks, got caught on the fabic and couldn't open any longer. Daughter said it happened everyday where it would get stuck on the fabric but that day just permanently jammed. Had to get a new backpack.
customer_reviews.author: zeetoe04

customer_reviews.title: Great size for elementary size kids, Kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 different styles for my kids. I have a 5 year old who just started kinder and it doesn’t look big on her like regular backpack sizes. It’s perfect size for elementary kids. I always look for side pockets to fit drinks and this style has 2 :) great quality and extra support with snap infront. I love the simple style to back Packs and these are perfect! Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia English

customer_reviews.title: Zipper malfunctioned/broke within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Backpack zipper malfunctioned within 2 days of having it. We took it on our trip to New York for toddlers plane ride. Didn’t even use it for much...a couple of pull-ups, wipes, pair of shorts and top for toddler. Kinda upset I wasted $20...had to go to Disney store and purchase another backpack. We left it behind in hotel so housekeeper could just get rid of it, no use bringing a broken product back home.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack! It’s cute and has held up well so far. I rated it 4 stars because it doesn’t feel super durable. I’m always really careful zipping and unzipping and make sure not to overload it, because I’m worried the zipper is fragile. That said, it hasn’t broken yet, so worthy of 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: etmama

customer_reviews.title: Was great two years ago. Now, new product?
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago we bought the unicorn backpack for preschool and Pre-K, and it is still functioning! We absolutely love it! It fits my daughter well, durable, and cute. This month, we purchased another one for kindergarten... And I can already tell the company changed their product. It feels flimsy and cheap. The material gets caught in the zipper and just doesn't feel like it's going to last long. We decided to keep it, we will see how long it lasts. I wish they wouldn't have changed the material of these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! My son used it for daycare and I stole it and made it into a diaper bag. It’s the perfect size to fit everything in it. I love the inside pocket. I store diapers in there. The only thing I don’t like it that the zipper sometimes gets stuck on the backpack when you try to open or close it.
customer_reviews.author: dogwierdo

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this backpack. Our first one we’ve had for two years and it’s used everyday for preschool and still in great condition. Now that my younger one is starting we got one for her as well. Patterns are super vibrant and cute, good durability, would definitely recommend. The size is perfect as well, it glean fit a full size folder, but isn’t so bulky that small kids can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice selections and we'll constructed
customer_reviews.text: So it little hard to write a review on this product since we have only had it for 1 week. Howver, our first impressions are very good. The backpack and the lunch bag are very well constructed. The size (small) for a 5 y/o (43 inch tall) is perfect. It is spacious and allows for a sweater, folder, the lunch bag, and water bottle storage. Most importantly, our kid loves the design. It'll be only a matter of time to see it's durability in the hands of a 5 y/o. We love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both have Vaschy backpacks and love them. My son’s backpack buckle broke and I contacted customer service. I was so impressed with their incredible customer service. They asked me for a picture of the broken part and shipped out a replacement back pack the same day. It arrived in two days and I was followed up with an email from Vaschy confirming if I had received the backpack or not. I am very impressed with the quality of service and my kids love their backpacks. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this backpack!! It was actually a little bigger than I was expecting, but that just means we’ll get more use out of it :-) The material is soft, but sturdy & the zippers are very smooth! I do wish the front pocket was a little bigger, but I’d definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack and cute
customer_reviews.text: This smaller size back park is perfect for a prek or kindergartener...the strap across the chest is perfect for comfort. It's got a large pocket on the back panel inside and is large enough to fit a full size folder and other school needs!!!! All other backpacks are too big for my kindergartener so this was perfect!!! Good quality and washes nice too
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! On the small side but it says so and I chose the smaller so yes! It's perfect! Super durable and made with amazing quality! Use it as my purse/diaper bag/always ready to go bag! Love the bottle storage and inside pockets! Designs are adorable and just adore this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Will do for preschool.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 y.o. daughter chose this as her first backpack for preschool. She's happy with it. I took one star off because I think it should have sturdier back support. Here there is basically none. I thought at this price point it should be a given. Otherwise, I would have bought something in the local superstore and paid half the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: My twins just entered kindergarten and they love these backpacks! The zippers do get caught sometimes, but not to the extent that you can't pull them out. Just be careful when zipping them and unzipping them. The print is nice and I like that it has a horizontal chest strap. Kids can easily strap it. This is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Looks very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: that's the first thing I looked for after opening the package. That was my reason for shopping online, I didn't want those available in local stores because i thought they weren't durable enough, wanted a backpack that would last my little girls at LEAST a year rather than a semester. It's strong and attractive and i received earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: GuGu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my almost 4 year old who attends ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my almost 4 year old who attends preschool. We can fit her lunch bag inside, with room for some clothes and art projects back from School. Downside the bottle pocket on the outside is rather small and tight. So we can’t fit her bottle there so I end up placing inside the back. That’s the only reason for the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great backpacks - fine quality and sturdily made. For once, the product exceeded the photos and description. One of the things I love most? The inside of the backpack is lined in a bright white and red pinstripe that makes seeing what's inside so much easier! Thees backpacks are reasonably priced and well worth every penny spent! I highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need another!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use my diaper bag back pack for back and forth to daycare and found that it was just too big and bulky. I needed something smaller for my one year old twin boys! I ordered this and couldn’t be happier. It’s just what I needed! All I need for the daycare bag are several changes of clothes. But, there is room for extra diapers and wipes in case we have to make a stop on the way home! Now, I need another one so both boys can have their own. Maybe Vaschy will do a giveaway? 😉
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Great size Preschool Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my three year ild who needed a small backpack that could fit a lunchbox and folder. I love the pockets on the side for drinks or a glasses case and the front pocket. It also has a chest buckle, an important feature that allows her to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but zipper jams frequently
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and functional, but the zipper catches the fabric that hangs over the zipper, and jams EVERY TIME. My elementary school kiddo can never get it zipped or unzipped because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Carry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, exceptional seller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who's going into kindergarten. I'd say it's a perfect bookbag for a girl; subtle colors and smaller size is perfect for a petite child. I have to add that I'd never bought from this seller before but would definitely do so in the future. Here's why: their attention to detail and customer satisfaction guarantee. In the bookbag I ordered, there was a beautifully designed card which included a thank you message and steps on how to return item, as well as the warranty info. Details are important, and this company does an exceptional job.
customer_reviews.author: Mirnesa Kadic

customer_reviews.title: Great sized preschool backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo girl wanted a dinosaur backpack for preschool. All the pink girly ones were too small, but she was happy with this even though it wasn’t pink. I love that it fits the full size folders and it’s not huge and bulky like other backpacks. Fits a preschooler perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Suenicorn

customer_reviews.title: Cute for PreK or Kinder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I bought it for my daughter that is entering preschool. I would only use this backpack for preschool or Kindergarten though. (MAYBE 1st grade..) It is however gonna be perfect for Kindergarten. Has a chest buckle for little kids so that the straps dont fall off their shoulders. Cute canvas material. Really cute. I'm really satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3-year-old son going to preschool 3 class. It is the perfect size for them and looks like it will last. It still fits a folder even though it is a smaller size. I really like that. It is comfortable for him and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Cbarona

customer_reviews.title: Cute on my toddler
customer_reviews.text: + My kid liked the space theme. + I like the chest strap, that really helps with keeping the backpack on. - The back part of the backpack is soft, so if you have a lumpy object like stuff animals the back part also gets lumpy. It does not keep its form. I would image that would be uncomfortable to wear. I've had to add a book in the inserted sleeve to make sure the backpack keeps its form when my kid tries to wear it. Overall it is super cute and holds the basics my little one would want. Favorite book, lights blanket, and favorite stuffed toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young elementary
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my K girl. The chest strap helps it to stay on without sliding off her shoulders. The zipper on the front pocket is a little stiff. If there were gussets on the front pocket it would make to easier to get items in and out
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT purchase for my preschooler who needed a bag that would fit a regular sized folder, but was small enough that it didn't dwarf her. This bag has been through a lot, but has not shown any wear or tear. The pattern choices are cute and fun! My daughter picked the unicorn print. The colors are great. The zippers don't stick. There's a divider inside the main holding space and side pockets for a water bottle. The front chest clip/buckle is awesome for keeping the bag straps on her shoulders. 100% RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good bag but titls to the side with a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old has been using this bag and it has been holding very good. I think it is a great bag. The only thing I dislike is when we put a water bottle in the side pocket, it tilts completely to that side and looks awkward. And I had to put the water bottle in the bag itself which could wet the contents if the lid is not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Siddarth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack to use for my 2 year old to bring to day care. It is perfect! A little big on him but that's what I had expected, I wanted it to be able to fit some extra clothes and his blanket that he bring daily. The backpack is perfect size for this and I'm hoping it will stay sturdy so he can use it for a few years! The straps do seem a bit flimsy but I'm hoping they hold a while. I did get a note inside indicating a year warranty which I was very happy about. Love this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then appears
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute it is, my son loves it, chest strap comes in handy he loves to run so it will stay on. Only one thing I don't like it's a lot more small then I thought so my sons school sends home folders and a binder, well it just fits a school binder it will fill up the whole backpack and won't even fit in the built in pocket on the inside which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Riv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for preschooler.
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/7: I had a problem with the backpack I received and got in contact with Vaschy, I spoke to Vina who was very attentive and kept in contact with me to resolve the issue. I have recieved the replacement backpack and Vina is still doing a great job at following up and making sure I am happy as a customer. 10/10 i would recommend. Thank you Vina and Vascy. I've been looking for a backpack that was small enough for my 3 year old but big enough to fit a folder in and this one is it! Definetly recommend and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a petite toddler
customer_reviews.text: If you have a petite toddler and don’t like the way those standard school backpack look so huge... this backpack is for you. It fits 8.5”x11” (standard US size) paper and the slightly larger folders that hold those papers, very well. No bending. Love this brand they need more designs!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4-k.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little backpack. It's the perfect size for a 4 year old and it holds all of his school supply items, which is not a lot at this age. Some reviewers opted for the standard size as it fits a folder better, but I actually think this one is perfect for a 4 year old's needs. Sure, the folder is kind of tight but I don't anticipate him bringing a ton of homework and other documents back and forth at this age. Again, perfect backpack! Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the black zipper strings!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The dye of the black little strings attached to the zippers were faded badly after wiping with water. It actually leaves my backpack with dark dye spots and makes it look very dirty. Luckily I was able to wipe it down. I’m not sure if it’s going to leave your kids’ clothes with the black dye as well. I would take those strings off and throw away immediately after you receive it. Not sure if it’s toxic. The backpack itself is fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Stressful mom

customer_reviews.title: Zipper trouble for kids
customer_reviews.text: On first look, this backpack seemed perfect for my kindergartener. She loved the design, the chest clip and the size. Unfortunately we had to buy a new backpack because the zipper gets caught at every unzip and zip up on the little tract of fabric covering it. My mom even had trouble helping her open it and gave up. I’m planning on keeping it as a overnight bag now but solely for a kids use, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi taylor

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for my kindergartener
customer_reviews.text: The search for the right sized bag that wasn’t a branded cartoon character was a long journey! This bag fits a folder, water bottle, lunch bag( matching set), spare set of clothes, gloves & hat in winter. The bag seems to be Of good quality and the bag by itself is not heavy. My son loves the space theme
customer_reviews.author: madohan

customer_reviews.title: Love this little bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect!! It fits a folder (which was a preschool requirement). It hasn't' fallen apart in the first four months and it looks like it might even make it a few school years! There are pockets on the side, perfect for a water bottle. A large pocket inside and the little pocket on the front that is still big enough to use makes this bag incredibly useful for me and my 3 year old. Everyone comments on how cute it is, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect size backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been so happy with this backpack.. it’s so durable and is the perfect size for my daughter.. she’s already very small in Stature, and I was afraid it would be too big. But it’s not! No one in her class has anything like this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Toddler size is PERFECT for my little 2.5 year old. She loves it, she carries it easily, and it holds just what she needs for her half day at school. We even throw her lunch box in and it’s a perfect fit with everything else. Would recommend. Would order again. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Raegan Swaringin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Backpack for Preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy backpack that is the perfect size for a preschooler to carry on their own. The chest strap allowed my son to carry his own backpack through the airport and on day trips. I only rated it a 4 for sturdiness and durability because he has only owned it for a couple months. So far holding up.
customer_reviews.author: MSour

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great.
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use the zipper broke and became unusable. Cute backpack but doesn’t hold up. Also the fabric is super thin.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kuffel

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive marketing
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointing. The side pockets on the dinosaur one are elastic and expand. This one doesn’t. They ARE NOT the same. Sort of a big deal on when you get it for the side pockets but it’s too hard for your kid to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Big, flimsy, not free return
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely huge for my 5 yo (not 12”!) and flimsy with no padding . Want to return and they’re charging 7.35 shipping! Almost half the price. Do not buy !!
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey Zalkin

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size for my 6 year old. It fits him great, it seems comfortable yet durable as well. I love the extra pocket on the inside as well. I'm hoping it can hold up to the kid test when he returns to school.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kids carry-on bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest backpack ever! It’s a little bit smaller than a traditional backpack that fits folders but was the perfect carry-on size for my daughter. Love the chest buckle so it doesn’t slide off during long walks through the airports and that it has pockets to hold water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag for toddlers and up
customer_reviews.text: This bag is cute 😍. Although it's big on her, she'll outgrow it and it will be perfect size for her. My daughter is also petite for a 2 year old lol. It's perfect size to put a towel, changing clothes every time they have a water play at daycare.
customer_reviews.author: a90supraguy

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 5 year old is in an outdoor preschool and her last backpack wasn't really cutting it. This one is perfect. Just the right size, front clip and 2 water bottle holders. And you can't go wrong with a unicorn design for a girl!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Right size for 3 yrs old, we ordered small
customer_reviews.text: We have NOT used it yet, will update once we do. But we love it! My son is almost 3 and average size. we purchased a small size bag and its perfect. I was worried about the size but his lunch bag ,notebook with change of clothes fit in it just fine. Everything he needs for nursery school fit in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: GMa Cakes&More.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! My sons daycare required a backpack for them to carry to and from “school” and we purchased this one, very happy with it! It’s light and can hold a good amount of stuff inside! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: quillah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, perfect size for 4yr old. Maybe a bit smaller for older kids. Has the 2 side pockets for her mask and water bottle and a pocket inside for the pencil box! Daughter loves the design and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lar1

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks exactly how it's described, it's also cute and has quality. My daughter loves it and we are glad to have bought it. We bought the small size and it's perfect for preschoolers. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chitramanalan

customer_reviews.title: Cute little backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 and in Pre K. This backpack is cute and the perfect size for her. It fits great and I love the chest strap. She loves the unicorn design. It’s a good size to fit a blanket, small snack bag, a book, a toy and her little school folder. We plan to use it for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for school and travel
customer_reviews.text: Got the bag for my 6 yr old daughter it's made of good durable material it's been almost a month and the bag has been in use and still holding strong fits standard size folders with no issue and composition books has pockets for storage and its adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Julio Paredes

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: It seems alright but it’s very very thin material. It does seem to be a good material for kids but unsure how long it’ll last due to the thinness. Super cute unicorn design. The large option fits my 5 year old and her school supplies. Hopefully it lasts the school year. I highly doubt it though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The cutest backpack ever.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this backpack for our first grader. She loves it. It is a perfect size for her. This backpack doesn’t swallow her body. It is a tad bit smaller than the normal sized back pack but it is perfect for our daughter. We bought the large size as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Months!
customer_reviews.text: We received this item on June 29 and my son loved it. He used it for his summer camp and the teachers complained all the time about the zipper getting stuck at its zip closure. By the end of August the zipper came apart and the bag turned into pure garbage. For the money that I paid for this I was expecting better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack with a chest strap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my just turned 3 year old. She is very small for her age, but her other back pack was too small to fit a folder for school. This backpack is awesome! The chest strap helps it stay on her skinny little shoulders. I didn’t realize how awesome that feature was but so glad we picked this one! It fits standard size folders. The Dino print is adorable without being too “boyish” or too “girly”. She loves it and so do we! It’s not too big for her even tho she is small.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: great pre school backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a perfect booking for my 3 year old to take to pre school. Its big enough to put a folder in it but not overwhelming on her either. She is in love with the cute unicorn design and brings it everywhere. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Dose

customer_reviews.title: Choice for Operation Backpack
customer_reviews.text: While we can't speak to the long-term usefulness of the backpack, it seems like a great choice for DC's Operation Backpack. We chose to participate in the grade 1-4 level and this seemed like something a child in that age category would enjoy each school day.
customer_reviews.author: Tashi

product_meta.title: Preschool Backpack,Vaschy Little Kid Backpacks for Boys and Girls with Chest Strap
feature_bullets: 1.UNIQUE DESIGN:Inspired by the artwork of a loving artist, our exclusive collection channels her spontaneous use of color and childlike sense of wonder. The collection of the kids backpack captures the spirits of imagination and fashion which inspire your little one to own their dreams.

2.EASY TO ORGANIZE:The preschool backpack features easy to open and close zipper tags, a main zippered pocket, two side pocket for water and mike, top loops for storage and other carrying options It's the most efficient and playfully designed collection around.Smooth SBS zippers for the little kids to open and close easily.Top loops for storage or other carrying options.

3.LARGE CAPACITY: 11x4.3x14.6inch/28x11x37cm(WxDxH),weighs 0.77LB/0.35KG.Side pockets:4.3x5.5inch/11x14cm.Capacity:11.5L.Inner divider fits the A4 tablet, activity books, etc.holds a lunch bag, two small notebooks, two books and a water bottle. It’s been a handy way of keeping their belongings (journals, books, collected treasures, etc.) organised

4.LIGHTWEIGHT:The preschoolder backpack is made of durable water-resistant polyester which is lightweight and easy to clean.The child-size backpack is perfect for toddlers going to preschool or play dates.The adjustable padded shoulder straps offer support and comfort while the adjustable chest strap stabilizes the load throughout the day's activities.
5.PERFECT GIFT:Recommended for children 2-years of age and up.The small backpack is a perfect gift for the lovely children.
